tool.name: SAGA.climate_tools.2
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py output_data_ORBPAR $output_data_ORBPAR name SAGA.climate_tools.2 START $START STOP $STOP STEP $STEP prefer $prefer response $response outputType_ORBPAR $OutputSection_ORBPAR.outputType_ORBPAR transmissionMode_ORBPAR $OutputSection_ORBPAR.transmissionMode_ORBPAR

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_ORBPAR
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_ORBPAR
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Orbital parameters used here are based on the work of Andre L. Berger and its implementation from the NASA Goddard Institute for Space Studies (GISS). Berger's orbital parameters are considered to be valid for approximately 1 million years.
